The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers arranged in dense clusters, and its seeds are encased in a hard, dry fruit. It is native to arid and semi-arid regions of Central Asia, including parts of Kazakhstan and Mongolia. Due to its hardy nature, it is often found in disturbed or marginal habitats.
